flawed_nl_solution:
Before Samuel walked across the porch, there were 331 - 223 = <<331-223=106>>106 dust particles.
Those 106 were 1/10 of the original amount, so there were 106 * 10 = <<106*10=1060>>1060 dust particles on the porch before Samuel swept.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 108, not 106. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
